alert.note: Alert for Lower Columbia Basin of Washington (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pendleton (Northeast Oregon and Southeast Washington)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 25 at 9:16AM PST until December 25 at 4:00PM PST by NWS Pendleton
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 PM PST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Freezing rain expected. Total ice accumulations of a light glaze to five tenths of an inch. * WHERE...Lower Columbia Basin of Washington. * WHEN...Until 4 PM PST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Difficult to hazardous travel conditions are possible with very slippery conditions, including Interstates 82 and 182, Route 395, and Highway 124. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Prepare for possible power outages. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1, or by visiting online at https://tripcheck.com for Oregon or https://wsdot.com/travel for Washington.
